message: Greetings, fine citizens of the realm! We hope your mid-semester exams went well. As the library site was down for most part of mid-semester exams, our site MFQP was also rendered to be down for the first few days, but we found a way out so that we could keep serving papers to everyone in KGP! Now, let's all contribute, and increase the papers MFQP has. Our Paper Collection Drive starts today! We request everyone to submit their mid-semester question papers. Here's how you can contribute - Click, Upload & Send. 1. Take a picture of your question paper 2. Write Subject Code in email 3. Send to metakgp-qp@ googlegroups.com And, do visit http://metakgp.github.io/... Never go to an exam without having had a look at the previous year's paper! Let's all work towards achieving that goal. That's all folks! Have a nice week ahead!

Want to know how to prepare for CFA Level 1? Read this guide written by Shugun Patel. https://wiki.metakgp.org/... If you have some experience which you think will help KGPians, please add it directly to MetaKGP or send an email to metakgp@ googlegroup.com
